title: Bug 17423: Revert appears twice in the popup menu.
description: There are two 'Revert' options in the menu.
OB: Two 'Revert' options are present in the menu.
EB: There should be only one 'Revert' option, and it should be disabled.
SR:
Steps to Reproduce:
1) Open a Java editor.
2) Make the editor dirty.
3) Popup the menu. The 'Revert' option should appear only once, disabled, after the 'UNDO' option and before the 'FORMAT' option.
